challengeName: TopCoder Studio UI Prototype Copilot Opportunity
detailedRequirements:
Contest Overview:
TopCoder Studio would like to revamp the Studio Member help area. We want to improve on the UI of the Studio Member help WordPress site and make the current design fit with the current TopCoder Studio website.The The Client and Studio Copilot will plan and run the wireframe and storyboard contests. We need a UI / Prototype Copilot, to run and manage the prototype contest.
 
For this project, we need a Copilot who has strong UI prototype skills, especially with WordPress. 
As the Copilot for this project we need you to:
- Consult with us on tools, plug-ins, and other elements that can be used within the current theme in an innovative manner.
- Be able to consult on the wireframe and storyboard contests
- Help evaluate wireframe submissions for the best flow.
         - Let us know if WordPress plug-ins are available for implementing infographics, videos, and full text for each "help topic"
- Run and manage the UI prototype contest to get the new Studio theme built
- Create or edit the winner's deployment guide
- Deploy solutions to a test WordPress environment
- Backup and restore content from the old site, if needed, otherwise confirm the content works correctly within the new theme
- Help deploy to the live production site and ensure complete functionality for staff members

Submission Deliverables:
To be considered, you must submit a Strategy Document that includes the following information:
- A statement outlining your expertise in:
     - WordPress
    - UI Prototype skills
- Include the following in your statement:
    - Ideas detailing how the Member Help section will work / function
- How to best utilize WordPress for our help area
   - Help evaluate wireframe submissions for the best flow.
         - Let us know if WordPress plug-ins are available for implementing infographics, videos, and full text for each "help topic"
   - Create or edit the winner's deployment guide
- Be able to consult on the wireframe and storyboard contests
- Describe any potential problems with including the current Studio header and footer into a WordPress theme 

Experience:
- UI Prototype
- WordPress knowledge
